Columns.Name: 特別改良判定保証単価フラグ

ExternalDatabaseInfo.CreateViewSql: select `main`.`group_id` AS `グループID`,`main`.`order_type_id` AS `申込タイプID`,`main`.`product_id` AS `商品ID`,(case when (`sub`.`original_product_name` is not null) then `sub`.`original_product_name` else `main`.`product_name` end) AS `商品名`,(case when (`sub`.`original_special_note` is not null) then `sub`.`original_special_note` else `main`.`special_note` end) AS `商品注釈`,(case when (`sub`.`special_price` is not null) then `sub`.`special_price` else `main`.`standard_price` end) AS `販売単価`,(case when (`sub`.`special_price` is not null) then 1 else 0 end) AS `特別販売単価フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`special_survey_price` is not null) then `sub`.`special_survey_price` else `main`.`survey_price` end) AS `調査単価`,(case when (`sub`.`special_survey_price` is not null) then 1 else 0 end) AS `特別調査単価フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`special_gurantee_price` is not null) then `sub`.`special_gurantee_price` else `main`.`gurantee_price` end) AS `保証単価`,(case when (`sub`.`special_gurantee_price` is not null) then 1 else 0 end) AS `特別保証単価フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`special_impjudge_gurantee_price` is not null) then `sub`.`special_impjudge_gurantee_price` else `main`.`impjudge_gurantee_price` end) AS `改良判定保証単価`,(case when (`sub`.`special_impjudge_gurantee_price` is not null) then 1 else 0 end) AS `特別改良判定保証単価フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`special_site_surveying_price` is not null) then `sub`.`special_site_surveying_price` else `main`.`site_surveying_price` end) AS `敷測単価`,(case when (`sub`.`special_site_surveying_price` is not null) then 1 else 0 end) AS `特別敷測単価フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`special_gove_surveying_price` is not null) then `sub`.`special_gove_surveying_price` else `main`.`gove_surveying_price` end) AS `役調単価`,(case when (`sub`.`special_gove_surveying_price` is not null) then 1 else 0 end) AS `特別役調単価フラグ`,`main`.`standard_price` AS `標準単価`,`main`.`survey_price` AS `標準調査単価`,`main`.`gurantee_price` AS `標準保証単価`,`main`.`site_surveying_price` AS `標準敷測単価`,`main`.`gove_surveying_price` AS `標準役調単価`,(case when (`main`.`active_flg` = 0) then 0 when (`sub`.`active_flg` = 0) then 0 else 1 end) AS `有効フラグ` from ((select `main`.`group_id` AS `group_id`,`main`.`order_type_id` AS `order_type_id`,`subb`.`product_id` AS `product_id`,`subb`.`product_name` AS `product_name`,`subb`.`special_note` AS `special_note`,`subb`.`standard_price` AS `standard_price`,`subb`.`survey_price` AS `survey_price`,`subb`.`gurantee_price` AS `gurantee_price`,`subb`.`impjudge_gurantee_price` AS `impjudge_gurantee_price`,`subb`.`site_surveying_price` AS `site_surveying_price`,`subb`.`gove_surveying_price` AS `gove_surveying_price`,`subb`.`active_flg` AS `active_flg`,`subb`.`quantity_need_flg` AS `quantity_need_flg`,`subb`.`quantity_minimum` AS `quantity_minimum`,`subb`.`quantity_calc` AS `quantity_calc`,`subb`.`base_price` AS `base_price`,`subb`.`quantity_unit` AS `quantity_unit`,`subb`.`product_order_type` AS `product_order_type`,`subb`.`product_type_id` AS `product_type_id`,`subb`.`default_quantity` AS `default_quantity`,`subb`.`over_or_surpass` AS `over_or_surpass`,`subb`.`billing_product_name` AS `billing_product_name`,`subb`.`survey_product_id` AS `survey_product_id`,`subb`.`warranty_product_id` AS `warranty_product_id`,`subb`.`analysis_product_id` AS `analysis_product_id`,`subb`.`survey_method_id` AS `survey_method_id`,`subb`.`direct_foundation_warranty_flg` AS `direct_foundation_warranty_flg`,`subb`.`compaction_account_product_flg` AS `compaction_account_product_flg`,`subb`.`FGC_Creator` AS `FGC_Creator`,`subb`.`FGC_CreateDate` AS `FGC_CreateDate`,`subb`.`FGC_LastModifier` AS `FGC_LastModifier`,`subb`.`FGC_LastModifyDate` AS `FGC_LastModifyDate`,`subb`.`FGC_Rowversion` AS `FGC_Rowversion`,`subb`.`FGC_UpdateHelp` AS `FGC_UpdateHelp` from ((`m_group_order_type` `main` join `m_product_order_type` `suba` on((`main`.`order_type_id` = `suba`.`order_type_id`))) join `m_product` `subb` on((`suba`.`product_id` = `subb`.`product_id`)))) `main` left join `m_group_product` `sub` on(((`main`.`group_id` = `sub`.`group_id`) and (`main`.`order_type_id` = `sub`.`order_type_id`) and (`main`.`product_id` = `sub`.`product_id`)))) order by `main`.`group_id`,`main`.`order_type_id`,`main`.`product_id`
